scripts.build: npm run build:macos && npm run build:linux && npm run build:windows
scripts.build:macos: electron-packager . --overwrite --asar --out=dist --ignore='^media$' --prune --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=static/Icon.icns --app-bundle-id=com.sindresorhus.caprine --sign='Developer ID Application: Sindre Sorhus (YG56YK5RN5)' --app-version=$npm_package_version && cd dist/Caprine-darwin-x64 && zip -ryXq9 ../Caprine-osx-${npm_package_version}.zip Caprine.app

releases.body: https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/1.7.0...1.8.0

Fix conversation switching keyboard shortcuts.

https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/1.6.0...1.7.0

- [Change the shortcuts for Muting/Archiving/Deleting a conversation.](https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine#keyboard-shortcuts)
- [Add shortcuts to jump directly to a conversation](https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine#jump-to-conversation-hotkey).
- [Add CLI flag to start the app minimized.](https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine#background-behavior)
- Dark mode tweaks.

https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/1.5.0...1.6.0

Added a right-click menu and various minor improvements and bug fixes. 

https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/1.4.1...1.5.0
Fix window dragging on OS X. Linux and Windows users don't need to update.

- Dark mode and performance improvements.
- The menubar on Windows is hidden by default. (Press <kbd>Alt</kbd> to toggle it)
- The Caprine dark mode is now independent from the OS X dark mode.  https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/commit/3b609b7810bf94188b5f3f1442bbfdf1dd3078af

https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/v1.3.1...1.4.0

## 

##### Homebrew Cask

Homebrew Cask users can upgrade by running:

```
$ brew update && brew cask install caprine
```

Bugfixes

https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/v1.3.0...v1.3.1

Add ability to zoom the text and shortcuts for muting, archiving, and deleting conversations.
(Thanks to @danhp!)

https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/v1.2.2...v1.3.0
Bump to Electron 0.37.6 and improve dark mode.
Bump Electron to [0.37.2](https://github.com/atom/electron/releases/tag/v0.37.2).

Caprine now ensures only one instance can be run at once. If you open Caprine when it's already running, it will just focus the current Caprine instance. And the Caprine dark mode now follows the OS X dark mode.

https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0

Some dark mode tweaks and on OS X you can now switch between conversations using <kbd>Cmd+Shift+[</kbd> & <kbd>Cmd+Shift+]</kbd> in addition to the existing <kbd>Ctrl+Tab</kbd> & <kbd>Ctrl+Shift+Tab</kbd> shortcuts.

https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/v1.0.0...v1.1.0

Added a super nice dark mode. Thanks to @oskarkrawczyk!

You can toggle dark mode in the `Caprine` menu or with <kbd>Cmd</kbd> <kbd>D</kbd>.

![](https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/raw/master/media/screenshot-dark.png)

- Add shortcuts for finding and selecting conversations https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/commit/7771885f3f8976d1e2df8c1c3b72fb21cf1174c1
- Upgrade to Electron 0.36.6 https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/commit/9a9f9f3634fa4d99f15534658dd7cb628975dfce

Upgrade dependencies and add tray menu for Linux and Windows. https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/commit/2bcbe11dd355590c858ebabcc55f653e2db74a07

https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/0.4.0...v0.5.1

Window state is now persisted and closing the window will no longer close the app.

https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/0.3.0...0.4.0
Show download progress (usually on the app icon). https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/commit/b9ae04dafa669f5a79771c26c5a0a0f7246b4c6e
Fix #26 - Duplicated icon in taskbar on Windows.
https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/0.1.2...0.2.0
Changes: https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/0.1.1...0.1.2

Changes: https://github.com/sindresorhus/caprine/compare/0.1.0...0.1.1
